page.title: 05Housing 2 in N/Ham/Coll P
page.content: The area is depressing, due to the empty houses, graffitti and general neglect. Most of the houses are owned by the local Borough Council. Some people have bought their house from the council.There is a large estate of flats in Shepherds Bush called "The White City Estate". Here most of the flats are up to ten stories high, with two or three bedrooms. There is nowhere for the children to play.The "Old Oak" estate and the "Wormholt" and "Flowers" estate consist of small houses, quite closly gathered together.Some of these houses are derelict,but some of them have been modernised and people take pride in them.In East Acton there is one new development, built by Barrats,the building company.They are flats and are giving a new dimension to the area.
